data.meta_site_name: Robert Gavora Fine and Rare Books
data.text:
Robert Gavora Fine and Rare Books is on vacation from August 8, 2024 to August 29, 2024. We are away but orders will be accepted and acknowledged. The orders will be processed and sent upon our return.

Hartwell, David G., and Kathryn Cramer, editors

MASTERPIECES OF FANTASY AND ENCHANTMENT

New York: St. Martin's Press, 1988. Thomas Canty. First edition, first printing. Hardcover. Fine / Fine. Item #49536

ISBN: 0312022506

An anthology of stories by Ursula K. Le Guin, Margaret St. Clair, Robert Heinlein, Joanna Russ, Horace Walpole, John Collier, Gene Wolfe, Frank R. Stockton, Theodore Sturgeon, Ray Bradbury, Fritz Leiber, and many others. Dust jacket illustrated by Thomas Canty. Fine in fine and bright dust jacket. An as new copy.

Price: $40.00
